mdRecord.dcterms:title: South-Western Line of U. States Mail Coaches: From Fredericksburg, Va. to Powelton, Geo. thence 36 miles to Milledgeville, Geo
Convenience and economy
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: South-Western Mail Coach Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 11 x 39 cm. on sheet 30 x 39 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Linear strip map, showing the main stage route, with cross connections, from Fredericksburg south to Milledgeville, with north oriented to the right.
Text printed below the map includes a note from "The Proprietors" indicating conveniences and costs, information on "Arrangement." (schedules), a list of Cross Stages, and a list of Distances.
"Convenience and Economy" printed just outside upper neatline.
Normal departure days supplied in manuscript. Map has been trimmed and mounted; text or different title possibly missing at top. Badly worn, with some loss of text.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Postal service--South Atlantic States--Maps
Stagecoach lines--South Atlantic States--Maps
South Atlantic States--Maps
Virginia--Maps
